name: Node

PostalAddress.name: PostalAddress
PostalAddress.description: The hardware, network, or application address of the Node.  If a NodeName is not provided, at least one Address MUST be specified.

Counter.name: Counter
Counter.description: A counter with which to summarizes properties of this host or network.

Location.name: Location
Location.description: A free-from description of the physical location of the equipment.

DomainData.name: DomainData
DomainData.description: The name of the Node (e.g., fully qualified domain name).  This information MUST be provided if no Address information is given.

Address.name: Address
Address.description: The hardware, network, or application address of the Node.  If a NodeName is not provided, at least one Address MUST be specified.

description: The Node class names a system (e.g., PC, router) or network.
